ipxact:field.ipxact:name: dataReady
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that new data is available in the receiver holding register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: transmitShiftRegisterEmpty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the transmitter shift register is empty

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: transmitHoldRegisterEmpty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the transmitter hold register is empty

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: breakReceived
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the a BREAK has been received

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: overrun
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that one or more characters was lost due to an overrun

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: parityError
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that a parity error was detected

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: framingError
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates thata framing error was detected

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: reserved
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: receiverEnable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set, enables receiver

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: transmitterEnable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set, enables transmitter

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: receiverInterruptEnable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set, enables generation of receive interrupt

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: transmitterInterruptEnable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set, enables generation of transmit interrupt

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: paritySelect
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Selects parity polarity (0=odd parity, 1=even parity)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: parityEnable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set, enables parity generation and checking

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: flowControl
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set, enables flow control using CTS/RTS

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: loopBack
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set, loopback mode will be enabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: externalClock
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set, the UART scaler will be clocked from EXTCLK

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: reserved
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: scalarReloadValue
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Scalar reload value

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: reserved
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved
